name: Addermarch Campaign - Session 4
tagline: in which the party confronts goblins and traps
shortSummary: In Roscombe and the Highmoor, the party prepares to destroy the Serpentine Dagger, takes a job from Caradoc, and launches an assault on a trapped goblin lair.
longSummary: Staying at The Traveler's Rest in Roscombe, Drou, Fazoth, and Yvan sell a vial of magical weapon-oil and buy extra healing supplies. At the Temple of the Sibyl they confer with Owen Tavish about ways to destroy the serpentine dagger, selling him an ancient holy symbol and learning that Trueflame might help. Visiting Caradoc's cottage near Brantor, they commission a dose of Trueflame and accept a contract to recover a stolen glowing poison recipe from local goblins. After a performance-filled manor dinner with Lady Elowen Duval and Sir Gareth Howell, where Gareth explains his missing squire and the goblins' hideout, the party treks north into the Highmoor, survives pit traps and ambushes at a cave entrance, and storms the goblins' underground living quarters in a brutal melee of spells and martial prowess.
